name: Supreme Chancellor Valorum (V)
Lore: 'Although Finis Valorum maintains the Galactic Senate''s ultimate title, his real power is mired by endless bureaucracy, petty corruption, and incessant plotting.',
Text: 'Agendas: order. May be targeted by Might Of The Republic. Your characters with politics (except Wedge and senators) are deploy -1 and gain [Republic] here. During your turn, may use 1 Force to take into hand a card with ''Valorum'', ''governor'' or ''political'' in lore from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
